ValidationRule.description: Sub-class is equal to Publications OR Web Technical Publications, a detail class MUST be selected to close the case AND the case cannot be closed unless it is assigned.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF( (Case_Record_Type__c = 'Tech Pubs') && ( ISPICKVAL( Type , 'Publications') ) && ( ( ISPICKVAL( Classification__c ,'CSO Special Programs') ) && ( ISPICKVAL( Sub_Class__c , 'Publications') || ISPICKVAL(Sub_Class__c, 'Web Technical Publications') ) && ( ISNULL(TEXT( Detail_Class__c )) || ISBLANK(TEXT( Detail_Class__c )) ) && ( ISPICKVAL( Status , 'Cancelled') || ISPICKVAL(Status , 'Done') ) && $Profile.Name <> $Label.API_data_Load_Profile ), true, false)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please go to the previous page and enter a value for 'Detail Class' to close the case.
